title: FAQs on all conspiracy theories about Trump assassination attempt
After coming within 1/8th inch of death, a reflective Trump turns a corner in life
content: ​ Coming within one-eighth of an inch of death from a gunman's bullet has made Donald Trump reflective and conciliatory, words not typically associated with him. Mostly combative and forceful, Trump turned contemplative about the narrow escape he had while speaking to two journalists on Sunday. “I’m not supposed to be here, I’m supposed to be dead,” Trump told the journalists, speaking about the fortuitous turn in his life. "The most incredible thing was that I happened to not only turn but to turn at the exact right time and in just the right amount."
summary: ​ Coming within one-eighth of an inch of death from a gunman's bullet has made Donald Trump reflective and conciliatory, words not typically associated with him. Mostly combative and forceful, Trump turned contemplative about the narrow escape he had while speaking to two journalists on Sunday. “I’m not supposed to be here, I’m supposed to be dead,” Trump told the journalists, speaking about the fortuitous turn in his life. "The most incredible thing was that I happened to not only turn but to turn at the exact right time and in just the right amount."

title: Secret Service chief Kimberly Cheatle, DEI ‘hiring’ slammed after Trump’s assassination attempt
content: The incident has also cast a spotlight on Cheatle’s efforts to promote diversity within the agency. In a previous interview with CBS News, she emphasized the importance of attracting diverse candidates and providing opportunities for everyone, particularly women. The Secret Service aims for 30% of its recruits to be women by 2030.
summary: The incident has also cast a spotlight on Cheatle’s efforts to promote diversity within the agency. In a previous interview with CBS News, she emphasized the importance of attracting diverse candidates and providing opportunities for everyone, particularly women. The Secret Service aims for 30% of its recruits to be women by 2030.

title: Mystery around Donald Trump shooting: 3 things we don't know
content: After FBI identified Donald Trump's shooter as Thomas Matthew Crooks, a lot of information and disinformation have surfaced but there are more questions unanswered even 36 hours after the assassination attempt on Trump. Crooks acted alone and used his father's AR-15-styl rifle to shoot at Trump at the Pennsylvania rally. The bullets grazed Trump's ear while Crooks was shot dead.
summary: After FBI identified Donald Trump's shooter as Thomas Matthew Crooks, a lot of information and disinformation have surfaced but there are more questions unanswered even 36 hours after the assassination attempt on Trump. Crooks acted alone and used his father's AR-15-styl rifle to shoot at Trump at the Pennsylvania rally. The bullets grazed Trump's ear while Crooks was shot dead.

title: Republican National Convention begins day after assassination attempt on Trump
Fate of top Hamas military commander uncertain after Israel's airstrike in Gaza
content: Israel's PM Benjamin Netanyahu has also acknowledged that there was "no certainty" that Deif had been killed. The Israeli military said its strike on Saturday aimed at Deif and Salama in "an open area" that was "not a tent complex, but an operational compound."​​
summary: Israel's PM Benjamin Netanyahu has also acknowledged that there was "no certainty" that Deif had been killed. The Israeli military said its strike on Saturday aimed at Deif and Salama in "an open area" that was "not a tent complex, but an operational compound."​​

title: Trump assassination attempt: BlackRock issues statement, says shooter Thomas Matthew Crooks featured in ad
content: Thomas Matthew Crooks, who attempted to assassinate Trump at a Pennsylvania rally, appeared in a 2022 BlackRock ad as a Bethel Park High School student. Crooks, armed with an AR-style rifle, was killed by Secret Service agents. BlackRock removed the ad, condemned the attack, and will release second-quarter results amid scrutiny over gunmaker investments. Footage provided to authorities.
summary: Thomas Matthew Crooks, who attempted to assassinate Trump at a Pennsylvania rally, appeared in a 2022 BlackRock ad as a Bethel Park High School student. Crooks, armed with an AR-style rifle, was killed by Secret Service agents. BlackRock removed the ad, condemned the attack, and will release second-quarter results amid scrutiny over gunmaker investments. Footage provided to authorities.

title: Musk criticizes NYT for Trump-related opinion page after assassination attempt
K P Sharma Oli takes oath as prime minister of Nepal for fourth time
Does conscription boost security?
content: Most of Europe has abolished compulsory military service. Now, faced with the threat from Russia, some countries want to bring it back.
summary: Most of Europe has abolished compulsory military service. Now, faced with the threat from Russia, some countries want to bring it back.

title: North Korea: Kim's sister outraged by leaflets from South
content: Kim Jo Yong, the North Korean leader's sister, has called South Koreans sending balloon-borne leaflets over the border "scum." She hinted that the North might resume sending trash-filled balloons to the South.
summary: Kim Jo Yong, the North Korean leader's sister, has called South Koreans sending balloon-borne leaflets over the border "scum." She hinted that the North might resume sending trash-filled balloons to the South.

title: US: 5-year-old dies after being left in hot car for 7 hours by foster mother
Photo of bloodied, defiant Trump takes on patriotic meaning
‘I’m supposed to be dead’: Trump reacts a day after assassination attempt
content: Donald Trump reflected on the foiled assassination attempt against him, attributing his survival to a momentary distraction from the crowd. In interviews, he expressed gratitude for surviving the incident, where he sustained an injury to his right ear. Trump acknowledged the iconic photo of him raising his fist amid the chaos, remarking on its significance and the fact that he did not perish. He praised the Secret Service's swift response while President Joe Biden condemned the violence, calling for a de-escalation of political rhetoric.
summary: Donald Trump reflected on the foiled assassination attempt against him, attributing his survival to a momentary distraction from the crowd. In interviews, he expressed gratitude for surviving the incident, where he sustained an injury to his right ear. Trump acknowledged the iconic photo of him raising his fist amid the chaos, remarking on its significance and the fact that he did not perish. He praised the Secret Service's swift response while President Joe Biden condemned the violence, calling for a de-escalation of political rhetoric.

title: Watch: Kate Middleton receives standing ovation at Wimbledon final
content: Kate Middleton, the Princess of Wales, stepped out at Wimbledon on July 14, marking a rare public outing amid her ongoing cancer treatment. Notably, Kate was given a standing ovation as she appeared in front of the crowd. She has been patron of the All England Lawn Tennis Club since 2016 but has been absent from the tournament this year until today's final. Kate came onto the court following the match to present the trophies.
summary: Kate Middleton, the Princess of Wales, stepped out at Wimbledon on July 14, marking a rare public outing amid her ongoing cancer treatment. Notably, Kate was given a standing ovation as she appeared in front of the crowd. Kate came onto the court following the match to present the trophies.

title: China, Russia start joint naval drills, days after Nato allies called Beijing a Ukraine war enabler
King Charles III plans extensive tour covering 12 time zones post Cancer treatment
content: King Charles III will embark on a demanding journey to Australia and Samoa in October, traversing a vast distance spanning 12 time zones. The palace's announcement on Sunday underscores the importance of this trip for the 75-year-old monarch, who has been steadily returning to his public responsibilities after a break necessitated by his cancer diagnosis earlier this year in February.
summary: King Charles III will embark on a demanding journey to Australia and Samoa in October, traversing a vast distance spanning 12 time zones. The palace's announcement on Sunday underscores the importance of this trip for the 75-year-old monarch, who has been steadily returning to his public responsibilities after a break necessitated by his cancer diagnosis earlier this year in February.

title: China's Communist Party will signal its approach to the country's challenges at a meeting this week
content: While the meeting typically focuses on such long-term issues, business owners and investors will also be watching to see if the party announces any immediate measures to try to counter a prolonged real estate downturn and persistent malaise that has suppressed China's post-Covid-19 recovery.
summary: While the meeting typically focuses on such long-term issues, business owners and investors will also be watching to see if the party announces any immediate measures to try to counter a prolonged real estate downturn and persistent malaise that has suppressed China's post-Covid-19 recovery.

title: Renowned singer Mary Millben to perform US national anthem at Trump's GOP nomination ceremony
Shooter at Trump rally was 'quiet', 'lonely', and 'bullied' during school years: Report
content: Former classmates described Crooks as a "quiet" and "socially reserved" student who often seemed "lonely," as per a report in ABC News. A classmate of the shooter described him as appearing "socially reserved" and someone who "didn't have a ton of friends," but there were no recollections of him discussing politics or Trump. He was being bullied for his appearance and clothing choices, such as wearing hunting outfits, the ABC News report said.
summary: Former classmates described Crooks as a "quiet" and "socially reserved" student who often seemed "lonely," as per a report in ABC News. A classmate of the shooter described him as appearing "socially reserved" and someone who "didn't have a ton of friends," but there were no recollections of him discussing politics or Trump. He was being bullied for his appearance and clothing choices, such as wearing hunting outfits, the ABC News report said.
